title.rendered: Telstra employees and Smile children spend a fun day together

content.rendered: A sports day was organized for the kids of Mission Education centre in Mumbai. 10-12 employees from Telstra took part in the activities. A game of Dog & Bone was played to break the ice between the employees and the children which was followed by more games like marble and spoon, sack race etc. Winners were given prizes and both the kids and the volunteers had a gala time all throughout the day.
